spec.name: Ship Captain
spec.subtitle: Independent Leaders
spec.description: Ship Captains captain ships. It's what they do and who they are. For most beings, investment in a vessel is an unfathomable dream. For Ship Captains, the lack of a vessel is an unbearable nightmare. Once they've tasted the freedom only a starship or wide ranging skimmer can provide, it becomes impossible to return to a predictable life and a seemingly meaningless existence. Ship Captains control their own lives.
